00025 // rest for a while
00026 sleep(1);
00027 require '../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00028 
00029 header('Content-type: text/javascript');
00030 // get search value
00031 if (isset($_POST['inputSearchVal'])) {
00032     $searchVal = $dbs->escape_string(urldecode(trim($_POST['inputSearchVal'])));
00033 } else {
00034     exit();
00035 }
00036 // query to database
00037 if ($_POST['type'] == 'author') {
00038     $data_q = $dbs->query("SELECT author_name
00039         FROM mst_author WHERE author_name LIKE '%$searchVal%' LIMIT 5");
00040 } else {
00041     $data_q = $dbs->query("SELECT topic
00042         FROM mst_topic WHERE topic LIKE '%$searchVal%' LIMIT 5");
00043 }
00044 if ($data_q->num_rows < 1) {
00045     exit();
00046 }
00047 $json_array = array();
00048 // loop data
00049 while ($data_d = $data_q->fetch_row()) {
00050     $json_array[] = $data_d[0];
00051 }
00052 // encode to JSON array
00053 if (!function_exists('json_encode')) {
00054     die();
00055 }
00056 echo json_encode($json_array);
00057 ?>
